attributes.action: We should equip HMS OCEAN and HMS ILLUSTRIOUS with the marine version of the F-35
attributes.additional_details: We should equip HMS OCEAN and HMS ILLUSTRIOUS with the F-35B, as it would improve are naval abilities and show to the world that we truly have a blue water navy and it would bring us to a new standard for the royal navy. It would create are own version of the the American or the French amphibious assault ship.
